Literature.Author: Roelants K, Fry BG, Ye L, Stijlemans B, Brys L, Kok P, Clynen E, Schoofs L, Cornelis P, Bossuyt F

Literature.Title: Identification of novel peptides from amphibian (Xenopus tropicalis) skin by direct tissue MALDI-MS analysis.
Literature.Author: Shigeri Y, Yasuda A, Hagihara Y, Nishi K, Watanabe K, Imura T, Inagaki H, Haramoto Y, Ito Y, Asashima M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>256 µM,Mouse splenocytes:IC50=>256 µM,Rat erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=20 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=>256µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>256µM),Micrococcus luteus(MIC=32µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=128µM),Trypanosoma brucei(90-100% Killing=8->256µM),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus JCM 2151(no activity data)
